employees.notes: Proff reports 736 employees on the company page; the year is interpreted from the same 2024 key-figures panel context [1].

revenue.notes: Proff shows operating revenue as 11,625,792 with 'Beløp i 1000'; value is converted to NOK (x1,000) for aggregation [1].

company.entity_resolution_notes: Entity resolved to the Norwegian legal company SUBSEA 7 NORWAY AS with org.nr 936742475 on Proff [1]. The reviewed annual-report publication is for Subsea7 Group/Subsea 7 S.A., so group disclosures are not directly legal-entity specific for Subsea 7 Norway AS [3].

srm_assessment.overall_summary: No direct, entity-specific evidence was found that Subsea 7 Norway AS uses recycled/recovered/waste-derived materials or fuels as inbound SRM inputs. Reviewed sources confirm company identity and activity scope, while available sustainability energy disclosures are presented at Subsea7 Group level rather than clearly allocated to this Norwegian legal entity [1][2][3].
gaps_and_uncertainties: Group disclosures mention biofuel and renewable-fuel consumption, but they are reported for 'the Group' and cannot be confidently assigned to Subsea 7 Norway AS [2][3].
No entity-level quantitative disclosure of inbound SRM input volumes (mass/volume/energy) was identified in the reviewed legal-entity/company-profile material [1].

evidence.evidence_snippet: Juridisk navn SUBSEA 7 NORWAY AS Org nr 936 742 475
evidence.claim: Legal name and Norwegian organization number for the entity.

evidence.evidence_snippet: 09.109 Andre tjenester tilknyttet utvinning av råolje og naturgass
evidence.claim: NACE code 09.109 is listed for the company.

evidence.evidence_snippet: 24.200 Produksjon av rør, rørdeler og andre hule konstruksjoner av stål
evidence.claim: NACE code 24.200 is listed for the company.
Employee count shown on company profile.
Financial figures are reported in thousands.
Operating revenue value and year shown on profile.
Company purpose text includes waste transport/brokering wording (not inbound SRM evidence).

evidence.evidence_snippet: Annual Report containing the Consolidated Financial Statements for the Subsea7 Group and the Financial Statements of Subsea 7 S.A.
evidence.claim: Annual report scope is Group and parent company, not explicitly Subsea 7 Norway AS legal-entity data.

evidence.evidence_snippet: In 2024, the Group successfully trialled a blend with 30% fatty acid methyl esters (FAME) biofuel on Seven Arctic.
evidence.claim: Biofuel use is disclosed at Group level.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Fuel consumption from renewable sources, including applicable biomass, industrial and municipal waste of biologic origin, biogas, renewable hydrogen, etc. MWh 2,791
evidence.claim: Renewable fuel consumption disclosure is provided at Group level.

sources.title: Subsea 7 Norway AS - Org.nr. 936 742 475 - Stavanger - Se Regnskap, Roller og mer
